title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Multiple loopholes in Microsoft Office allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems.

title: SUSE: CVE-2025-2857: SUSE Linux Security Advisory
title_translated: SUSE: CVE-2025-2857: SUSE Linux Security Advisory
summary: Firefox vulnerability allows sandbox escape on Windows, affecting Firefox < 136.0.4, ESR < 128.8.1, and ESR < 115.21.1.
